list.name: Maintenance Started
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  st AS time,
  task as text
FROM
  maint_done
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(et)
ORDER BY 1 DESC

list.name: Maintenance Finished
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  et AS time,
  task as text
FROM
  maint_done
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(et)
ORDER BY 1 DESC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ctime AS time,
       'con'||sessid AS metric1,
       cpu/6/48  -- divide by cores and hosts count
       --vmemsz/1024/1024 vmemGB
FROM sess_cpu_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
--GROUP BY 1,2 
ORDER by 1,2 desc;

panels.title: CPU usage by user session (normalized to whole cluster max cpu capacity)

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
quh AS (SELECT ssid,
               regexp_replace(substr(query_text,0,200),E'[\\n\\r ]+', ' ', 'g' ) AS query
        FROM queries_history 
        WHERE ($__timeFrom()::timestamp with time zone, $__timeTo()::timestamp) OVERLAPS (tstart,tfinish)
        UNION ALL
        SELECT sess_id,
               regexp_replace(substr(current_query,0,200),E'[\\n\\r ]+', ' ', 'g' )
        FROM pg_stat_activity
        GROUP BY 1,2),
ioh AS (SELECT ctime::timestamp with time zone AS ct,
               sess_id,username||'@'||db AS user,
               state,
               "rKBps"/1024 AS rMBps
        FROM sess_io_history
        WHERE ctime AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
        )
SELECT date_trunc('minute', ioh.ct) AS time,
  AVG(rMBps), -- Mind: this includes only user sessions. Add segment server process stats (pidstat -dl 1 15| grep -E "Average.*postgres.*(silent|process)") to complement to queries_history.net_rb_rate
  coalesce(ioh.user||' \\ con'||quh.ssid||': '||quh.query,'Others<20sec') AS metric
FROM ioh LEFT JOIN quh ON quh.ssid=ioh.sess_id
AND rMBps>1
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1,3;

SELECT ctime AS time,
       'con'||sessid AS metric,
       --cpu/6/48  -- divide by cores and hosts count
       rss/1024/1024 vmemGB -- RSS can also include shared memory so don't be surprised if total physical memory is oversubscribed
FROM sess_cpu_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
--GROUP BY 1,2 
ORDER by 1,2 desc;

panels.title: Memory usage by user sessions (RSS on all nodes) in GB

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ssid,
       regexp_replace(substr(query_text,0,200),E'[\\n\\r ]+', ' ', 'g' ) AS query
FROM queries_history
WHERE ssid IN(${sess_id:csv}) and
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY ssid
select (100*avg(case when status='u' then 1 else 0 end))::smallint as state from gp_segment_configuration;
select case when mode='s' then 'SYNCED' when mode='r' then 'DOWN' when mode='c' then 'CHANGE TRACKING' end,count(*)::integer from gp_segment_configuration group by 1 order by 1;
select count(*) from pg_stat_activity;

SELECT
  $__time(ctime::timestamp with time zone),
  queries_total
FROM
  database_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  CASE WHEN (logseverity='PANIC' OR logmessage LIKE '%checksum does not match%' OR logmessage LIKE '%access status of transaction%' OR logmessage LIKE '%Could not open file%pg_clog%' OR logmessage LIKE '%Error on receive from seg%' OR logmessage LIKE '%invalid memory alloc request%') THEN 1 
       WHEN ((logseverity='FATAL' AND logmessage NOT LIKE 'no pg_hba.conf entry for host %' AND logmessage NOT LIKE 'database % does not exist') OR logmessage LIKE '%deadlock%' OR logmessage LIKE '%Out of memory%') THEN 2 
       WHEN logmessage LIKE 'no pg_hba.conf entry for host %' OR logmessage LIKE 'database % does not exist' THEN 5
       WHEN logseverity='ERROR' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END AS sev,
  to_char(logtime,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS time,
  logdatabase,
  regexp_replace(regexp_replace(logmessage,E'( .cdbdisp.*|http response code | .url_curl.c:455. )', '', 'g'),E'effective url: .* error code', 'error code', '')
FROM
  ext_log_today
WHERE
  logdatabase!='gpperfmon' AND
  logseverity in ('PANIC','FATAL','ERROR') AND
  logmessage not like 'too many connections for role%' AND
  logmessage not like 'column "pid" does not exist%' AND
  logmessage not like 'division by zero' AND
  logmessage not like '%metastage_loc_info%'
  /*$__timeFilter(logtime)*/
ORDER BY logtime DESC

SELECT 
  to_char(time,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS time,
  replace(hostname,'.msk.trd.ru',''),
  fselocation,
  c.dbid::int,
  h.desc
FROM
  gp_segment_configuration c,
  gp_configuration_history h,
  pg_filespace_entry f 
WHERE
  h.dbid=c.dbid and 
  c.dbid=f.fsedbid and
  now()-time<interval '4 week'
  --and $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT 
  ctime,
  hostname,
  msg
FROM
  varlogmessages_history
WHERE
  now()-ctime<interval '4 week' and 
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1 DESC

select 
      extract(minute from now()-query_start) as MINUTES,
      datname,
      procpid,
      usename,
      client_addr,
      regexp_replace(substr(current_query,0,200),E'[\\n\\r ]+', ' ', 'g' ) 
from pg_stat_activity 
where waiting 
order by 1 desc;

--select procpid,datname,usename,client_addr,waiting_reason,count(*) as CNT from pg_stat_activity where waiting and current_query <> '<IDLE>' group by 1,2,3,4,5;

select distinct db,
      substr(wait_q_started::text,0,20) AS wait_q_started,
      user_waits,
      query_waits,
      substr(block_q_started::text,0,20) AS block_q_started,
      user_blocker,
      query_blocker,
      extract(minute from wait_q_started-block_q_started) AS lock_duration
from locks_log_ext 
where wait_q_started-block_q_started>interval '10 minute' and 
      query_blocker!='<IDLE>' and
      $__timeFilter(wait_q_started::timestamp with time zone)

WITH top1cpu_sys AS (
select * from 
	(select ctime::timestamp with time zone,hostname,cpu_sys,row_number() over (partition by ctime order by cpu_sys desc) as rn 
	from system_history 
	where hostname not like '%master%' and $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)) subqq 
	where subqq.rn=1), top2cpu_sys AS (
select * from 
	(select ctime::timestamp with time zone,hostname,cpu_sys,row_number() over (partition by ctime order by cpu_sys desc) as rn 
	from system_history 
	where hostname not like '%master%' and $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)) subqq 
	where subqq.rn=2)
SELECT t1.ctime::timestamp with time zone AS time,t1.hostname,t1.cpu_sys as highest_cpu_sys--,t2.cpu_sys as other_cpu_sys 
FROM top1cpu_sys t1,top2cpu_sys t2 
WHERE t1.ctime=t2.ctime and t1.cpu_sys-t2.cpu_sys>20
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  max(swap_page_in) pages_IN,
  max(swap_page_out) pages_OUT 
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
group by ctime
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  max(cpu_user+cpu_sys) AS "max cpu util"
  --hostname,
  --avg(cpu_user+cpu_sys) OVER (ORDER BY ctime ROWS 4 PRECEDING) AS "cpu util"
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
group by ctime--,cpu_user,cpu_sys,hostname
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime::timestamp with time zone,1m,0),
  hostname AS metric,
  avg(disk_rb_rate+disk_wb_rate)/1024/1048/1024 AS "GBps"  -- disk_*b_rate measured in sectors (512 byte)
FROM system_history
WHERE
  hostname not like 'gp-master%' AND
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  now AS "time",
  datname,
  sum(size)/1024/1024/1024 AS sum_spills_GB
FROM spill_all
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(now)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime::timestamp with time zone,1m,0),
  hostname AS metric,
  avg(await) AS "await"
FROM sar_disk
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  now AS "time",
  usename,
  sum(size)/1024/1024/1024 AS sum_spills_GB
FROM spill_all
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(now)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime::timestamp with time zone,1m,0),
  hostname AS metric,
  avg(disk_ro_rate+disk_wo_rate) AS "Iops"
FROM system_history
WHERE
  hostname not like 'gp-master%' AND
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  now AS "time",
  'seg'||segid,
  sum(size)/1024/1024/1024 AS sum_spills_GB
FROM spill_all
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(now)
group by now,segid
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  hostname,
  max(100*bytes_used/total_bytes::bigint) AS max_seg_space_used
FROM diskspace_history
WHERE
  filesystem like '/data%' and
  filesystem not like '%db_dumps' and
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  ctime AS "time",
  queries_total,
  queries_running,
  queries_queued
FROM database_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  hostname,
  max(100*bytes_used/total_bytes::bigint) AS max_seg_space_used
FROM diskspace_history
WHERE
  filesystem like '%db_dumps' and
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  hostname,
  cpu_user
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  hostname,
  cpu_sys
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone  )
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  hostname,
  disk_ro_rate+disk_wo_rate AS Iops
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  hostname,
  (disk_rb_rate+disk_wb_rate)/1024/1024 AS MBps
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  hostname,
  100*mem_used/mem_total AS mem_pct
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ctime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  max(net_rb_rate) AS RX,-1*max(net_wb_rate) AS TX
FROM system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime::timestamp with time zone)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  'con'||ssid,
  regexp_replace(substr(query_text,0,200),E'[\\n\\r ]+', ' ', 'g' )
FROM
  queries_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
  --AND ssid=$var-ssid
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  extract(minute from (et-st)) as value,
  msg AS metric,
  maint_ctime as time
FROM tmp_maint
ORDER BY st

list.definition: SELECT ssid FROM queries_history WHERE $__timeFilter(ctime) ORDER BY ssid
list.name: sess_id
list.query: SELECT ssid FROM queries_history WHERE $__timeFilter(ctime) ORDER BY ssid
